string.text: {=str_comment_vassal_introduces_self.aserai.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.aserai.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Amazigh for generations.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.aserai_honor.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the Imperial Court and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the Sultanate.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.aserai_mercy.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the Amazigh.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.aserai_boasting.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Amazigh.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.aserai_boasting_cruel.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Amazigh. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
